name: Nona
description:
He does not remember anything ... he does not know where he is here ... he forgets something important ... but he can not remember anything ......
The main character "Nona" awakens because of a mysterious voice that echoes in my head. Nona does not remember the place he woke up, and those who live according to the mysterious power of "mission" around us ... .... Nona will defeat the black enemies called "Vis" with them, but the vague anxiety and discomfort within them grows day by day. At that time, Nona said that discomfort, "Bug" ... that is to say that he is a traitor.
Who created the "Mission" ...... Who on earth is "Vis" ...... With such a doubt Nona must survive desperately to find out who he is ... ....

This game is a short story that the main character who lost memory finds out why he was born and why he is alive.

Feature

· About 10 enemies

· Combine about 12 kinds of skills and about 17 types of parks to defeat the enemy

· Depending on the direction of attack, attacks are prevented and you eat counters

· It is not just physical strength. Let's stop enemies from trying to collect "Magcell"

· In order to strengthen the character, "Magcell" must be protected

· Isometric view

· Compact story
